questions.questionTitle: What will the man probably do next?

script:
� So Robin, are you ready to meet with our new clients on Friday?
� Actually, Ben, I'm not. Mr. Evans asked me to help Rebecca with a rush order yesterday, so I'm behind on my presentation.
� Uh oh. I'll see if I can reschedule for Monday. Would that give you enough time to finish?
� Yes it would. I'll work all day Friday on it, then over the weekend if I need to. Don't worry, I'll be ready by Monday. Thanks.
